context.p: Plug-in setup required to activate component document

ul.li:
T24 Common Stream
T24 Common Stream available in RTC server contains the documents to assist component documentation. Anyone who wants to accessing the component documents must have to sync this T24 Common Stream to their workspace.

Preferences Page Setup
Preferences page setup helps to find out where the documents has been located while accessing component documents.

p.u: How to sync T24 Common stream:

ol.li: Go to the Team Artifacts view.
Connect with RTC server if not connected already.

li.p: Ensure that you have connected with T24 project area (see the below image for connecting to project areas).

ol.li: Right-click on the T24Common Stream which is presented in Source Control of T24 Project Area.
Change the name of the workspace if needed.
Select the option Find and Load Eclipse Projects.

li.p: Make sure that Component Root Folder is alone selected.

p.u: How to setup the preferences page:

step.cmd: Select the T24 Basic Editor Page
Give the path of T24CompDoc in T24 Doc Location.
Click on Apply and then OK Button
